whyMe.text: I enjoy coding because I like understanding how things work and solving problems step by step. I find it motivating to turn an idea into something that actually works. I stay focused even when things get complex, and I appreciate working with others to find better solutions together.

currentlyLearning.title: I am currently learning
currentlyLearning.goal: I regularly learn new technologies and deepen my knowledge step by step. This helps me grow my skills and apply them more effectively in my projects.

join.aboutTheProject: Join is a social network project where users can share posts, comment, and like content to connect within a community.
join.organisation: I focused on a clean structure, a clear UI, and connecting data — including authentication/storage with Firebase.
join.whatILearned: I learned how to integrate Firebase data, build features step by step, and keep the overall code structure maintainable.

elPolloLoco.aboutTheProject: A cartoon-style jump and run: collect coins, avoid enemies, and fight your way through the desert to the final boss.
elPolloLoco.organisation: The game is split into level logic, characters, and collision handling. Animation and sound logic are implemented in a structured way.
elPolloLoco.whatILearned: I learned a lot about object-oriented JavaScript, game loops, collision detection, and working with game assets.

pokedex.aboutTheProject: A responsive Pokédex app with interactive cards, type-based colors and icons. Users can scroll and search by name or ID.
pokedex.organisation: Data is loaded via an API and displayed in a clean UI. Search and details are built to stay fast and responsive.
pokedex.whatILearned: I improved my API workflow, data handling, and building a UI that works well on mobile devices.
